name: Monster Lab (itch) (SuperGamersGames)
description:
In the depths of a lab, monsters are being experimented on. You are a spirit that has escaped it's test tube. Can you escape before you lose your form?

Monster lab is a short and quick race against time. As a spirit losing it's form swiftly, you must escape the lab containing all sorts of unnameable monsters.

Music:

Moon Chime by Oddroom
Spectacle Carousel by 3xBlast
